name: Pocket Pup
description:
Hello and welcome to Pocket Pup!
Learn & have fun with Pip, Fido, Spot and Rex.
This app is aimed at kids aged between 2 and 4. As with all of the apps in the Wonder World series, Pocket Pup helps kids learn through fun.

We look for ways that kids can build skills pre-school, such as shape recognition and counting, that keep kids entertained, when you need to concentrate on other things.

It’s a safe environment for kids to explore where they will not be faced with adverts. You as a parent can be completely confident that your child will never be shown content that you would not want them to see.

Feed Fido, count with Rex, bathtime with Spot & friends and colour in Pip. We know a lot of adults enjoy the activities too!

We hope you have a great time playing so keep a look out for updates and more exciting additions to the Wonder World series coming in the near future, we hope you and your child will be entertained as we introduce more fun and creative digital play.

How to Play
On the main screen, tap on the play button. This will load the activity selection screen. Tapping on each animal will launch an activity specific to them.

Animals & Activities
Feed Fido
Items drop from the sky, but only some can be fed to Fido. Drag the correct item onto Fido's mouth to see if he can eat it!

Count with Rex
Count how many times Rex barks. You'll hear him pant when you're correct and whimper when you're not.

Bathtime with Spot & friends
Spot and his friends have gotten all mucky and need you to help them clean up. Drag the bar of soap over each dog until they're completely covered in bubbles, then wipe them all away with the towel.

Colouring in Pip
In this activity, kids get to colour in by choosing a colour and then tapping on each area of the picture. Each time they colour an area the picture starts to animate and come to life.
